Audio is processed on-device. It\'s not stored or shared with anyone, including DuckDuckGo.
DuckDuckGo never listens to what you say. Audio is processed on-device. It isnâ€™t stored or shared with anyone.
Microphone Access Required for Private Voice Search
To use Voice Search in DuckDuckGo you need to enable Microphone access in the system settings.
Remove Private Voice Search option from the address bar?
You can always manage this and other accessibility preferences in Settings.
